title: Dua to have a child - Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: says that one of her friends is not be is not being able to conceive so is there any dua in the Quran where she can get a child we where she can supplicate to Allah so she'll there is a dua of the career ability turn if and further on want everything there is the door of and at the end of surah Furqan where we also ask Allah Azza WA JAL to grant us from our offspring and from our spouses a satisfaction to the eyes but nothing specific so you ask Allah Azza WA JAL you supplicate to Allah Azza WA JAL whatever you want and Allah Azza WA JAL will respond to your supplications
